client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM was introduced to Boucher Thomas Bernard at a corporate retreat in Paris. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Boucher Thomas Bernard is a 26 year old and comes from France.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Boucher Thomas Bernard is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Boucher received his secondary school diploma from Lycée International de Lyon in 2017.
Boucher earned his degree from University of Toulouse in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Boucher Thomas Bernard is a 26 year old and comes from France.
Boucher Thomas Bernard launched his career as a Family Office Manager at Crédit Agricole S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2023 till now.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 10000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1490000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Corporate Lawyer, in 2020.
client_description_Client_Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
